alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Garland; Perry; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 10:52PM CST until January 11 at 11:30PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... South central Faulkner County in central Arkansas... Central Garland County in central Arkansas... Saline County in central Arkansas... Central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 1130 PM CST. * At 1051 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Hot Springs Village to near Jessieville to near Mountain Pine, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Hot Springs... Benton... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Hot Springs Village... Southwest Little Rock... Mayflower... Mountain Pine... Otter Creek... Burns Park... Morgan... Marche... Chenal Valley... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Roland in Pulaski County... Pinnacle Mountain State Park... Jessieville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas.
